items.sentence: Tom helped an old lady load her groceries in her car.
Tom is wearing the same clothes as he wore yesterday.
Somebody broke into Tom\'s house while he was asleep.
I think you know that Tom isn\'t planning to do that.
Tom\'s closet is full of stuff that he doesn\'t need.
She was soon sound asleep because she was very tired.
Tom will likely spend the rest of his life in prison.
I should\'ve told Tom that I didn\'t know any French.
I think Tom should do what he says he\'s going to do.
If you visit Tom now, he\'ll probably be watching TV.
